meanings.sent2: Yesterday, she menstruated for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The girl giggled when she menstruated during class.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions menstruated along with her cycle.
meanings.sent5: The river of blood menstruated from her body, marking the passage of time.

meanings.sent2: During puberty, girls begin to menstruate.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed surprised when it menstruated on the carpet.
meanings.sent4: The city's economy menstruated with the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The clouds menstruated rain, nourishing the thirsty earth.
